relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: Matroska Multimedia Container
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">other</field><field name="filenameExtension">mkv, mka, mks, mk3d</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: Audiovisual file format that can wrap an unlimited number of video, audio, still picture, and/or subtitle tracks.  A wide range of audio and video encodings are supported.
